program: (PARI) A024153(n) = if(n%2,0,my(k=0, t, p=n/2); for(a=1,n,for(b=1+max(a,(p-a)),n-(a+1),my(c=n-(a+b)); if((c<=b),break); if(((t = (p*(p-a)*(p-b)*(p-c))) > 0)&&issquare(t),k++))); (k)); \\ _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 25 2018
